Text: The Arrow of Gold is a novel by Joseph Conrad, published in 1919.
Triplets:<The Arrow of Gold
3:
--------------------
Text: The Arrow of Gold:  The characters of the novel are supporters of the Spanish Pretender Carlos, Duke of Madrid.

Triplets:<The Arrow of Gold
4:
--------------------
Text: The Arrow of Gold:  Curiously, the novel features a person referred to as "Lord X", whose activities as arms smuggler resemble those of the Carlist politician Tirso de Olazábal y Lardizábal, Count of Arbelaiz.
Triplets:<The Arrow of Gold
